dictionary.name: tables
dictionary.phrase: select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_name = ?

CREATE TABLE emo_item_orders ( typeid INTEGER NOT NULL, bid INTEGER NOT NULL, region_id INTEGER NOT NULL, vol_remain BIGINT NOT NULL, station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, duration VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, issued TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, expired TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, price DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE emo_item_value_cache ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "old" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', created TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, typeid INTEGER NOT NULL, region VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL, buy_vol BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', sell_vol BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', sell_price DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', buy_price DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', move DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' );

CREATE TABLE emo_exports ( typeid INTEGER NOT NULL, regionid INTEGER NOT NULL, "old" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', reportedtime TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, "source" VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, "content" bytea NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY( typeid, regionid, "source" ) );

CREATE TABLE emo_profile_log ( "id" SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "log_time" INTEGER, "guid" VARCHAR(100), "program" VARCHAR(300), "in_out" VARCHAR(5), "path_info" VARCHAR(300), "mem_change" INTEGER, "duration" DOUBLE PRECISION, "query_data" bytea );
